column5: Anybody know if Ara Lake Camp has changed ownership yet? Shirley and Dick Fayle were in the process of looking for buyers. Mike

Yep. The Smith family recently purchased Ara Lake Camp from Shirley Fayle and is looking forward to the 2017 fishing and hunting season. Sadly, Mike, our dear friend of 42 years, Dick, passed in January. The Smiths are raring to go and would like to hear from our friends! As you might imagine, we hope to keep Shirley involved with Ara Lake Camp.
